alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Union County, north central Jackson, Union, northwestern Ouachita and eastern Lincoln Parishes through 230 AM CST... At 200 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Farmerville to 12 miles northwest of Claiborne to 7 miles southeast of Ruston. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huttig, Farmerville, Choudrant, Marion, Felsenthal, Downsville, D Arbonne, Loch Lomon, Spencer, Oakland, Haile, Linville, Bayou D Arbonne Lake, Rocky Branch, Cecil, Eureka and Litroe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for south central Arkansas...and north central Louisiana.
